name: voice-flow
description: Voice-Flow - AI-powered voice transcription desktop app

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ELECTRON" -c "yellow,cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:backend:unix: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cd app && npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:electron
scripts.build:prod: echo 'Building Frontend...' && cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && echo 'Building Backend (Voice Engine)...' && cd backend && pyinstaller --name voice-engine --onefile --noconsole main.py && cd .. && echo 'Building Installer...' && cd app && npm run dist
